attributes.action: create a new form of award to honour those who may be eligible to receive a knigthood if they were alive today
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is along the lines of a previous petition, that to posthumously knight Bob Paisley, differing in that it is requesting that a new title is introduced in order to honour those who are now deceased. As the Prime Minister acknowledged, there are many individuals who have contributed greatly to British society, but are unable to fulfil the requirements to receive the Knighthood. If this were successful, it would allow these men and women to receive the acknowledgement they deserve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
